name: Pet of the Week – G.G.
description: This week's Pet of the Week is G.G., a laid-back Chihuahua who loves chill vibes. At 9lbs, G.G. is perfect for anyone looking for a dog to sit in their lap while relaxing on the couch!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week’s Pet of the Week is G.G., a laid-back Chihuahua who loves chill vibes. At 9lbs, G.G. is perfect for anyone looking for a dog to sit in their lap while relaxing on the couch! If you are interested in adopting G.G., visit SDDAC.com.
